Comments_List: I learnt how to get my point across clearly and convincingly. One of the most important things I learnt was how to prune out redundant and pompous words.
Better writing skills in memoirs, scientific and fictional writing.
Better writing skills and techniques; Roger's comments and edits were always super helpful and as someone who learns from constant correction having every piece reviewed was very educational.
It was more work than anticipated for one credit, but I'm very glad to have taken it.
It improved my writing skills and creativity in writing

There could have been more intention in selecting students' work to read aloud. If the professor had specific feedback (positive and negative) that we could have all learned from, that would have been helpful.
Strengths-a very encouraging Professor with whom you can freely discuss your doubts; weekly write-up assignments and thoughtful corrections.
It was an excellent experience to read other people's writing and making comments on each other's writing which helped in improving my writing.
You get out of it what you put in.

I will highly encourage student to take the course. Your writing will surely improve by the end of the course and lessons picked will get set because of the weekly submissions-corrections that will root out bad writing practices.
This is the best course for creative and improved writing
